verses.text: The \w former|strong="G4413"\w* \w treatise|strong="G3056"\w* have I \w made|strong="G4160"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \w Theophilus|strong="G2321"\w*, \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w*,

\w Until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* in \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he was taken \w up|strong="G0353"\w*, after that \w he|strong="G1781"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* had given \w commandments|strong="G1781"\w* unto the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he had \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w*:

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* he \w shewed|strong="G3936"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w alive|strong="G2198"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w passion|strong="G3958"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* infallible \w proofs|strong="G5039"\w*, being \w seen|strong="G3700"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w forty|strong="G5062"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w speaking|strong="G3004"\w* of the things pertaining \w to|strong="G4012"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, being assembled \w together|strong="G4871"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \add them\add*, \w commanded|strong="G3853"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* that they \w should|strong="G5563"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w depart|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \wj  \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w wait for|strong="G4037"\+w* \+w the promise|strong="G1860"\+w* \+w of the Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w*,\wj* \add saith he\add*, \wj  \+w ye have heard|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w of me|strong="G3450"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w John|strong="G2491"\+w* \+w truly|strong="G3303"\+w* \+w baptized|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w with water|strong="G5204"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w ye|strong="G5210"\+w* \+w shall be baptized|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w many|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w hence|strong="G3326"\+w*.\wj*

When \w they|strong="G4905"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* were come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, they \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w wilt|strong="G1487"\w* \w thou|strong="G0600"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* restore \w again|strong="G0600"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* to \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w It|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w for you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w to know|strong="G1097"\+w* \+w the times|strong="G5550"\+w* \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w the seasons|strong="G2540"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the Father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w hath put|strong="G5087"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G2398"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w ye shall receive|strong="G2983"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1411"\+w*, \+w after that|strong="G1904"\+w* \+w the|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w is come|strong="G1904"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5209"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w ye shall be|strong="G2071"\+w* \+w witnesses|strong="G3144"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w both|strong="G5037"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w Judæa|strong="G2449"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in Samaria|strong="G4540"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the uttermost|strong="G2078"\+w* \+w part of the earth|strong="G1093"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, while they \w beheld|strong="G0991"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was taken \w up|strong="G1869"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w cloud|strong="G3507"\w* \w received|strong="G5274"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G3788"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w while|strong="G5613"\w* they looked \w stedfastly|strong="G0816"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w as|strong="G4198"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* went \w up|strong="G4198"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* stood \w by|strong="G3936"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w apparel|strong="G2066"\w*;

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1057"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* stand \w ye|strong="G2476"\w* gazing \w up|strong="G1689"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*? this \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, which is taken \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2064"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* in like \w manner|strong="G5158"\w* \w as|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* returned \w they|strong="G5290"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w mount|strong="G3735"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Olivet|strong="G1638"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w from|strong="G1451"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* a sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*’\w s|strong="G2192"\w* \w journey|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* come \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, they went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* an upper \w room|strong="G5253"\w*, \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w abode|strong="G2650"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Andrew|strong="G0406"\w*, \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Thomas|strong="G2381"\w*, \w Bartholomew|strong="G0918"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Matthew|strong="G3156"\w*, \w James|strong="G2385"\w* \add the son\add* of \w Alphaeus|strong="G0256"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Zelotes|strong="G2207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \add the brother\add* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w continued|strong="G4342"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* in \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w supplication|strong="G1162"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* the \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* stood \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, (the \w number|strong="G3793"\w* of \w names|strong="G3686"\w* \w together|strong="G1909"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* an \w hundred|strong="G1540"\w* and \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w*,)

\w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* must \w needs|strong="G1163"\w* have been \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w* spake \w before|strong="G4277"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w*, which \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w guide|strong="G3595"\w* to them that \w took|strong="G4815"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2674"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w numbered|strong="G2674"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had \w obtained|strong="G2975"\w* \w part|strong="G2819"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3767"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w purchased|strong="G2932"\w* a \w field|strong="G5564"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* the \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w falling|strong="G1096"\w* \w headlong|strong="G4248"\w*, he burst \w asunder|strong="G2997"\w* in the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w* gushed \w out|strong="G1632"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w dwellers|strong="G2730"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*; insomuch \w as|strong="G5620"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w field|strong="G5564"\w* is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* in \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w proper|strong="G2398"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1258"\w*, \w Aceldama|strong="G0184"\w*, \w that|strong="G5124"\w* is to \w say|strong="G2076"\w*, The \w field|strong="G5564"\w* of \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of \w Psalms|strong="G5568"\w*, \w Let|strong="G1096"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w habitation|strong="G1886"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w desolate|strong="G2048"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G2077"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* man \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w therein|strong="G1722"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bishoprick|strong="G1984"\w* \w let|strong="G2983"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w take|strong="G2983"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G3767"\w* of these \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* have \w companied|strong="G4905"\w* with \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w among|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*,

\w Beginning|strong="G0756"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* that \w same|strong="G3739"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he was taken \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w must|strong="G1096"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* be ordained to \w be|strong="G1096"\w* a \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w appointed|strong="G2476"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Barsabas|strong="G0923"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* was \w surnamed|strong="G1941"\w* \w Justus|strong="G2459"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Matthias|strong="G3159"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, which knowest the \w hearts|strong="G2589"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*, \w shew|strong="G0322"\w* \w whether|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* thou hast \w chosen|strong="G1586"\w*,

That he may \w take|strong="G2983"\w* \w part|strong="G2819"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w apostleship|strong="G0651"\w*, \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* by \w transgression|strong="G3845"\w* fell, that he might \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they gave \w forth|strong="G1325"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w lots|strong="G2819"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w lot|strong="G2819"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w Matthias|strong="G3159"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he was \w numbered|strong="G4785"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*.
